metadata.title: CVE-2020-36775 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:f2fs: fix to avoid potential deadlockUsing f2fs_trylock_op() in f2fs_write_compressed_pages() to avoid potentialdeadlock like we did in f2fs_write_single_data_page().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
